attributes.action: dismiss Jacqui Smith, with immediate effect,  for gross missappropriation of expenses and a public enquiry should be established to investigate the expense requirements of all members of parliament.and introduce a stringent system of controls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been claimed that Ms Smith acted within the rules, however I do not believe that the rules specify that a female minister can keep her husband amused by the supply to him of pornographic material of any description supplied on expenses paid for by the taxpayer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
